overview: Carmelo Jos√©, an old age lonely man, walks through the desert with only a shovel and a  blood leaking trash bag which leaves a small blood mark on its trail. He walks to a small  desert glade where he dug a hole, there he empties the trash bag filled with  dismembered human bodies.  On the next day his son, Nazario, returns like every week to deliver him the last human  pieces to disappear.
title: El Canto De Las Cigarras
